title: Phone app for calling numbers show wrong contact names from my second added (mother) mail.
content:
I have 
Xiaomi Redmi Note 8 Pro - Latest available update
I added my mother mail to phone because I need to use and administrate her youtube account.
Her contacts are not copied to my Google Contact app and my primary account is used as default contact mail. 
But when I call my Dad, I have message "Calling My Darling" ðŸ˜†
I cant see, or find that in settings to change contacts mail in that app.
Biggest problem is, because my english is not the best, and app is called "Phone", so when I Google it, Google think to I search my problem for any phone who has app for any contacts app. Something like that. 
Sometimes, simple names are big problem ðŸ™„.
So I ask you here, I dont know what or how to google this to find correct answer.

Edit: Now I see to this is Pixel Help Community.. Sorry for this.. Didn't realize until send this message and go to home page of community.
I find this through search..
